IndividualQuote.description: Data model for individual quote in a bulk quote request

note.description: An optional note associated with the quote

dateOfBirth.description: Date of birth in the form YYYY-MM-DD

displayName.description: Display name of the sender, if known.

fspId.description: Mojaloop scheme FSPID of the DFSP which owns the party account.

idValue.description: The identifier string used to identify the sender.

merchantClassificationCode.description: Up to 4 digits specifying the sender's merchant classification, if known and applicable.

transactionId.description: ID of the transaction, the ID is decided by the Payer FSP during the creation of the quote

IndividualQuoteResultFailed.description: Data model for failed individual quote in a bulk quote response

statusCode.description:
Backend error code from FSP. Ideally, statusCode is FSPIOP conforming. SDK will use status code to retrieve an FSPIOP error with the same code.
Otherwise, a suitable generic FSPIOP will be used with the errorResponse in the FSPIOP error message.

IndividualQuoteResultSuccess.description: Data model for successful individual quote in a bulk quote response

extensionListComplex.description: Data model for the complex type ExtensionList

transferError.description: This object represents a Mojaloop API error received at any time during the transfer process

httpStatusCode.description: The HTTP status code returned to the caller. This is the same as the actual HTTP status code returned with the response.

mojaloopError.description: If a transfer process results in an error callback during the asynchronous Mojaloop API exchange, this property will contain the underlying Mojaloop API error object.

errorInformation.title: ErrorInformation
errorInformation.description: A Mojaloop API error information construct.

errorCode.description: The API data type errorCode is a JSON String of four characters, consisting of digits only. Negative numbers are not allowed. A leading zero is not allowed. Each error code in the API is a four-digit number, for example, 1234, where the first number (1 in the example) represents the high-level error category, the second number (2 in the example) represents the low-level error category, and the last two numbers (34 in the example) represents the specific error.
errorCode.title: ErrorCode

extensionList.description: Data model for the complex type ExtensionList

generalError.description: This object may represent a number of different error object types and so its properties may vary significantly.

fspId.description: FSP identifier.

transferState.description: Below are the allowed values for the enumeration - RECEIVED DFSP has received the transfer. - RESERVED DFSP has reserved the transfer. - COMMITTED DFSP has successfully performed the transfer. - ABORTED DFSP has aborted the transfer due a rejection or failure to perform the transfer.

fspId.description: FSP identifier.

quoteRequest.description: A request for a quote for transfer from the DFSP backend.

amount.description: Depending on `amountType`. If SEND - The amount the Payer would like to send, that is, the amount that should be withdrawn from the Payer account including any fees. The amount is updated by each participating entity in the transaction. If RECEIVE - The amount the Payee should receive, that is, the amount that should be sent to the receiver exclusive any fees. The amount is not updated by any of the participating entities.

amountType.description: SEND for send amount, RECEIVE for receive amount.

feesAmount.description: The fees in the transaction. The fees element should be empty if fees should be non-disclosed. The fees element should be non-empty if fees should be disclosed.

from.description: Information about the Payer in the proposed financial transaction.

dateOfBirth.description: Date of birth in the form YYYY-MM-DD

displayName.description: Display name of the sender, if known.

fspId.description: Mojaloop scheme FSPID of the DFSP which owns the party account.

idValue.description: The identifier string used to identify the sender.

merchantClassificationCode.description: Up to 4 digits specifying the sender's merchant classification, if known and applicable.

geoCode.description: Indicates the geographic location from where the transaction was initiated.

latitude.description: The API data type Latitude is a JSON String in a lexical format that is restricted by a regular expression for interoperability reasons.

longitude.description: The API data type Longitude is a JSON String in a lexical format that is restricted by a regular expression for interoperability reasons.

initiator.description: Specifies if the initiator of the transfer is the Payer or Payee.

initiatorType.description: Specifies the type of the transaction initiator.

note.description: An optional note associated with the requested transfer.

to.description: Information about the Payee in the proposed financial transaction.

dateOfBirth.description: Date of birth in the form YYYY-MM-DD

displayName.description: Display name of the sender, if known.

fspId.description: Mojaloop scheme FSPID of the DFSP which owns the party account.

idValue.description: The identifier string used to identify the sender.

merchantClassificationCode.description: Up to 4 digits specifying the sender's merchant classification, if known and applicable.

transactionId.description: ID of the transaction, the ID is decided by the Payer FSP during the creation of the quote

transactionType.description: Type of transaction for which the quote is requested.

quoteResponse.description: A response to a request for a quote.

geoCode.description: Indicates the geographic location from where the transaction was initiated.

latitude.description: The API data type Latitude is a JSON String in a lexical format that is restricted by a regular expression for interoperability reasons.

longitude.description: The API data type Longitude is a JSON String in a lexical format that is restricted by a regular expression for interoperability reasons.

payeeFspCommissionAmount.description: Transaction commission from the Payee FSP.

payeeFspFeeAmount.description: Payee FSP’s part of the transaction fee.

payeeReceiveAmount.description: The amount that the Payee should receive in the end-to-end transaction. Optional as the Payee FSP might not want to disclose any optional Payee fees.

transactionId.description: ID of the transaction, the ID is decided by the Payer FSP during the creation of the quote

transferAmount.description: The amount of money that the Payer FSP should transfer to the Payee FSP.
